com.ami.mse.ucms.repository

Class UploadBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ami.mse.ucms.repository.UploadBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named(value="uploadBean")
@ViewAccessScoped
public class UploadBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Contains methods for processing DocumentInstance and handling the upload the of the file to the JackrabbitRepository with various type of properties.
    Author:
    Tony, Ivo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void handleFileUpload(org.primefaces.event.FileUploadEvent event)
        Fill the instance of the DocumentInstance with required properties plus properties that are generated by the user. Then pass the instance to the method that saves the uploaded file and the instance to
        Parameters:
        event - the event JackrabbitRepository

      • fillPropertyMap

        public void fillPropertyMap()
        Fills the docPropMap with the key that are passed through the session and the values from the propValues list. Put docPropMap in to the session

      • save

        public String save(DocumentInstance documentInstance)
            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Sets all properties to the instance of the DocumentInstance and pass this object to the JCRDocumentService addDocument() method.
        Parameters:
        documentInstance - the document instance
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - the repository exception

      • pullValueFromComponent

        public void pullValueFromComponent()
        Extract the values of the generated components by the user and add them to the propValues list. Also helps to render some components on the page upload-document
